title: Refutation Text-Based Narrative Design to Correct Misconceptions in Earth Science (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of foundational earth science concepts (crust composition, plate tectonics, etc.)
context.additional_context: Parallel Use of Digital/Print Materials in Smartphone-Centric Environments, Strengthening Concept Correction and Application Skills Through Project-Based Activities

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify major misconceptions in earth science (e.g., crustal fixity, simplified volcanic formation mechanisms) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can use refutation-text-based materials to transition existing misconceptions into scientifically corrected concepts.
Learners can design and present a project that integrates at least three core concepts necessary for explaining earth science phenomena in PBL activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
